typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Not enough on account for withdrawal"

arguments.value: Not enough on account for withdrawal

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Not enough on account for withdrawal"

documentation.text:
@notice Get balance for a gift card
 @return The balance for a gift card

@notice Get pool total deposited amount
 @return The total eth deposited in the lending pool.

@notice When a new ETH Gift Card is created, ether is transfered into Gift Card Pool so it's available when user wants to redeem it.
 @return id of the newly created ETH Gift Card created.

@notice Withdraw deposited ether from ETH Gift Card Contract based on the amount of ETH specified for the ETH Gift Card that is been redeemed.
 @return The amount of ETH that was transfered.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Not enough on account for withdrawal"

arguments.value: Not enough on account for withdrawal

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Not enough on account for withdrawal"

documentation.text:
@notice Get balance for a gift card
 @return The balance for a gift card

@notice Get pool total deposited amount
 @return The total eth deposited in the lending pool.

@notice When a new ETH Gift Card is created, ether is transfered into Gift Card Pool so it's available when user wants to redeem it.
 @return id of the newly created ETH Gift Card created.

@notice Withdraw deposited ether from ETH Gift Card Contract based on the amount of ETH specified for the ETH Gift Card that is been redeemed.
 @return The amount of ETH that was transfered.

returns._0: The balance for a gift card
The total eth deposited in the lending pool.
id of the newly created ETH Gift Card created.
The amount of ETH that was transfered.

getGiftCardBalance(uint256).notice: Get balance for a gift card

newGiftCard(uint256).notice: When a new ETH Gift Card is created, ether is transfered into Gift Card Pool so it's available when user wants to redeem it.

redeem(uint256).notice: Withdraw deposited ether from ETH Gift Card Contract based on the amount of ETH specified for the ETH Gift Card that is been redeemed.

userdoc.notice: This contract will be used for storing and redeem purchased Eth Gift Cards.
